name: Hanna v. Reliance Insurance Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagkn, JJ.
parties: Hanna v. Reliance Insurance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The declaratory judgment for the plaintiff entered by the court below is affirmed at appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Daniel J. Ryan, with him LaBrum and Doak, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Hanna v. Reliance Insurance Company, Appellant.
January 4, 1961:
Argued November 22, 1960.
Before Jones, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagkn, JJ.
Philip E. Berens, for appellant.
Daniel J. Ryan, with him LaBrum and Doak, for appellee.
